messages: {ping} just show up, hold my beer
{ping} we hope you brought pizza, get them in {seat}
{ping} just log in, where were you ?
{ping} Who are you ? {seat} is a restricted seat only for 42 student
{ping} how did it get so late so soon ({seat})
{ping} I could tell that you're late but I prefer chronologically challenged. ({seat})
{ping} do you know that fall into a spatio-temporal rift is not a pretext to be in late ?
{ping} It's a miracle, come in {seat} to see this !
Wow {ping}, I didn't expect to see you so soon...
Aaaaaand {ping} break a new times the world record of the longest break !
